Entry.Content:
Tech Blogs and people I want to find out about:

http://www.lostechies.com/ and http://codebetter.com/ – Kyle Baley, Jeremy Miller, Chad Myers, Jimmy Bogard

http://www.jpboodhoo.com/publications.oo – JP Boodhoo.  videos to watch too

http://whileicompile.wordpress.com/2010/08/24/my-clean-code-experience-no-1/ – John MacIntyre doing an example using Uncle Bobs clean code book.  Has a downloadable sample project.

http://thecleancoder.blogspot.com/ – Uncle Bob Martin

http://www.udidahan.com/?blog=true – Udi Dahan (NServiceBus)

http://blog.wekeroad.com/thoughts/vim-is-your-daddy – Rob Conery.. here is a blog on Vim

 http://ayende.com/ – Oren Eini aka Ayende Rahien.  Rhino Mocks, Nhibernate Profiler

http://www.martinfowler.com/ Martin Fowler / Thoughtworks

Greg Young, Eric Evans, Michael Feathers, Scott Hanselman

Joe Obrien, Jim Weirich, Jon Stahl (LeanDog), Dave Laribee, Aaron Jensen, Andy Hunt, DHH, Jeff Atwood, Scott Bellware, Mike Gunderloy

Bjorn Rochel, Stefan Lieser, Kyle Baley, Scott Cown, Will Green, Chris PhatBoyG Patterson, Brain Donahue

 

http://randomcode.net.nz/about/ – Neal Blomfield, Wellington.  Castle Windsor, DDD, Git, MonoRail, NHibernate

http://www.mindscape.co.nz/blog/index.php/2010/09/13/mindscape-teched-nz-2010-videos/ – JD Trask, Ivan

Other Blogs

Tim Ferris

www.kimandjason.com – Jason… live with less stress and more fun

Tech Videos

www.tekpub.com – bought an MVC video set from here.. was great

http://peepcode.com/ – paid for videos
Entry.Title: Becoming a Great Coder - Resources
Entry.Author: admin
